title: # 418 - Jon Reep & ME
description:
Today I chat remotely with Comedian Jon Reep. We talk about Rogan going to Spotify, what it would be like if I had a twin, stories from our trips to Russia, Jon’s long lost Russian Pen Pal, and much more!

Check out Jon Reep’s Podcast “Country-ish” wherever you get yours. 

This podcast is brought to you by Tiege Hanley. Get started for just $25 when you visit http://www.tiege.com/bertcast and get a FREE toiletry/dopp bag with your first box. 

This podcast is also brought to you by Theragun. Go to http://www.Theragun.com/bertcast right now and get your Gen 4 Theragun today.

This episode is also brought to you by Whoop. Get 15% off your membership at http://www.whoop.com by using the promo code “BERT” at checkout

This episode is also brought to you by MeUndies. Get 15% off your first order and free shipping at http://www.meundies.com/Bert 

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
